name: 3D Snow Truck Racing - eXtreme Winter Driving Monster Trucks Race Games
name_original: 3D Snow Truck Racing - eXtreme Winter Driving Monster Trucks Race Games
description:
Get ready for an adrenaline packed wild racing game where you're goal is to go as F-A -S -T as you can down a wild road full of traffic. Along the way you have to avoid a variety of oncoming traffic and mayhem!

Do you have what it takes to win the race?

>> FEATURES <<

- Cool 3D graphics.
- Super simple controls.
- Non stop action! :)
